alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder and western Tooele Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 855 PM MDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles west of Knolls to 19 miles south of Utah Test and Training Range South. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet reported wind gusts up to 55 mph along I-80. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause difficult cross winds on I-80 and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 15 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
